title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1168/97 of 26 June 1997 extending the provisional anti-dumping duties on imports of sacks and bags made of polyethylene or polypropylene originating in India, Indonesia and Thailand
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1168/97 of 26 June 1997 extending the provisional anti-dumping duties on imports of sacks and bags made of polyethylene or polypropylene originating in India, Indonesia and Thailand
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The validity of the provisional anti-dumping duties on imports of sacks and bags made of polyethylene or polypropylene originating in India, Indonesia and Thailand imposed by Regulation (EC) No 45/97 is hereby extended for a period of three months and shall expire on 15 October 1997. It shall cease to apply if, before this date, the Council adopts definitive measures or the proceeding is terminated pursuant to Article 9 of Regulation (EC) No 384/96.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 June 1997.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 56, 6. 3. 1996, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 317, 6. 12. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 12, 15. 1. 1997, p. 8.
